ValidationRule.description: Closed - No Action Reason required when Status: Closed - No Action when Case Record Type is 'Compliance_Sub_Case'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Status ,"Closed - No Action") && ISBLANK( Closed_No_Action_Reason__c ) && RecordType.Name = 'Compliance Sub Case'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reason must be provided if Status for Case is Closed-No Action for Compliance Sub Case Record Types.
